summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2549, for the improvement of East 55th Street, between 21st Avenue Northeast and Ravenna Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and laying concrete walks, under Ordinance No. 29612 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
